businesses.name: St. Clair County Courthouse
businesses.description: The county courthouse for St. Clair County, built in 1976. This modernist 5-story building replaced the historic 1861 courthouse that was demolished in 1972.

businesses.name: Lofts on the Square
businesses.description: Historic 1931 Art Deco hotel converted to senior apartments. Originally Hotel Belleville, this 6-story landmark anchors the Public Square and was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 2018.

businesses.name: Lincoln Theatre
businesses.description: Historic 1921 theater featuring first-run Hollywood films, live concerts, and performances. Stars like Ginger Rogers and the Marx Brothers have graced this stage. Home of the Belleville Philharmonic.

businesses.name: Abe's Gourmet Popcorn
businesses.description: Award-winning gourmet popcorn shop connected to the Lincoln Theatre. Famous for creative flavors and locally beloved snacks.

businesses.name: The Candy Bar & The Tea Spot
businesses.description: Sweet shop offering candies, chocolates, and specialty teas in downtown Belleville.

businesses.name: Keil's Clock Shop
businesses.description: Specialty clock shop offering antique timepieces, repairs, and clock sales. A downtown Belleville institution.

businesses.name: Bennie's Pizza Pub
businesses.description: Beloved local pizzeria and pub serving classic pies and drinks in the heart of downtown.

businesses.name: Cosmic Comics, Collectibles & Games
businesses.description: Comic book store featuring comics, collectibles, trading cards, and tabletop games.

businesses.name: Eckert Florist
businesses.description: Local florist offering floral arrangements for all occasions.

businesses.name: Big Daddy's 618
businesses.description: Popular downtown restaurant and bar in the heart of Belleville's Main Street district.
